HeroBlock.content: Hi, I’m Tarik. I’m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who can craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences, let’s shake hands with me.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.content: The backbone of modern web applications, enabling interactive and dynamic user experiences.

skills.title: React
skills.content: A component-based library that helps build fast, dynamic, and reusable user interfaces.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.content: Adds strong typing to JavaScript, reducing errors and improving scalability for large applications.

skills.title: TailwindCSS
skills.content: A utility-first CSS framework for quickly building custom, responsive designs.

skills.title: Next.js
skills.content: A powerful React framework that supports server-side rendering and static site generation.

skills.title: Redux Toolkit
skills.content: Simplifies global state management and helps organize complex React applications efficiently.

profile.Education: Bachelor's Degree in Biology, Hacettepe University, 2016

projects.title: Workintech
projects.description: Witflix is a sleek and responsive movie browsing platform where users can discover trending films, view detailed movie information, and build their own favorites list. Built with Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript, it offers a smooth and fast user experience with modern design and optimized performance.

projects.title: Tekno Pizza
projects.description: Tekno Pizza is an interactive pizza ordering application where users can customize their pizzas with various ingredients, select sizes, and submit orders through a responsive and user-friendly interface. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript, it features form validation with React Hook Form and seamless navigation for a smooth ordering experience.

projects.title: Bookstore
projects.description: Bookstore is a modern and responsive web application where users can browse a wide selection of books, view detailed information, and add their favorite titles to a shopping cart. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript, the app features form handling with React Hook Form, clean UI components, and dynamic cart management for a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Project Management
projects.description: Project Management is a user-friendly task and project tracking application designed to help teams plan, assign, and manage their work efficiently. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript, it includes features like task creation, deadline setting, progress tracking, and form handling with React Hook Form, all within a clean and responsive interface.

projects.title: Portfolio Web Site
projects.description: Portfolio Web Site is a professional and fully responsive personal portfolio application designed to showcase projects, skills, and experience. Built with React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Redux, the site features smooth navigation with React Router, organized project sections, and a modern UI to highlight development capabilities effectively.

projects.title: Film Db
projects.description: Film Db is a dynamic movie database application where users can browse a wide range of films, view detailed information, and manage a list of their favorite movies. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and Redux, the app offers a responsive interface and efficient global state management for features like filtering, navigation, and user-selected favorites.

projects.title: Lesson Goals
projects.description: Lesson Goals is a simple and effective goal-tracking application that helps users create, manage, and monitor learning objectives or study tasks. Built with React, TailwindCSS, and Redux, the app allows users to add, complete, and remove goals in a clean and responsive interface, providing a focused and organized learning experience.

Footer.title: Let’s work together on your next product.
